Newsletter Title Issue Number
NavDB Update Approaches with Flight Path Angles in Excess of 6.0 degrees included in Cycle 1308 Database Procedures with flight path angles in excess of 6.0 degrees have been restored to applicable Honeywell navigation databases. Inclusion of these procedures is effective with Cycle 1308.... Read <http://www.mygdc.com/new/static/fms_news_desc.php?art=navdb_update> More>>
Flight Management System Version 6.1 Upgrade Corner FMS Software Version NZ 6.1 WAAS/LPV The Honeywell FMZ-2000 Flight Management System (FMS) version 6.1 provides better access to more airports, increased safety, reduced crew workload and significant operational efficiency improvements... Read More>> <http://www.mygdc.com/new/static/fms_news_desc.php?art=fms_upgrade>
FMS Software Version NZ 6.1 Active Leg Preview Function One of the many new features operators will enjoy with NZ 6.1 software is the "Preview an Active Leg Change in Flight" function. Honeywell has received several reports from newly upgraded operators that the functionality... Read More>>
Global Customer Committee News Honeywell Goes Right to the Source to find out what Business Aviation Customers are Thinking The Global Customer Committee, an 85-member group that includes pilots and chiefs of maintenance from corporate flight departments, as well as representatives of large aviation service centers that maintain... Read More>>
Training News Free Pilot Training Honeywell offers several types of free training opportunities to customers. In addition to the free training provided during Entry into Service and operators conferences throughout the year, Honeywell provides online training... Read More>>
Honeywell Flight Technical Services Operator Conference Pilot Breakout Sessions The Honeywell Flight Technical Services team hosts breakout sessions for pilots at approximately 15 operator conferences every year, connecting with the operators who use Honeywell products and services every day... Read More>>
GDC Update myGDC iPad App Version 2.0 The Honeywell Global Data Center has just released version 2.0 of the myGDC iPad app. The app received several upgrades and new features... Read More>>
Events and Training 2013 Calendar of Events and Training Opportunities Honeywell Customer and Product Support pilots will be available at many events this year, including Honeywell Operators Conferences, online Webinars, and customer/industry events. Read More>> Upcoming Events & Training
8/22 - RDR-4000 Radar for Boeing 9/4 - KSN-770 Functions & Features 9/5- Frankfurt, Germany 9/11 - Dallas, Texas Online Pilot Training Webinar <https://www.mygdc.com/new/static/cpsfltops_training.php?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRow5%2FmYJoDpwmWGd5mht7VzDtPj1OY6hBoqILyJK1TtuMFUGpsqOOGRDwcJBJVtzF8%3D> Tech Ops Center <https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/portal/%21ut/p/b1/04_Sj9CPykssy0xPLMnMz0vMAfGjzOJDfU19LNxMTQzc3UONDTzNQ7zN3AICDA0sjPULsh0VAb6AM7A%21/>
